basics.name: Alexey Rogachev
basics.label: Web programmer
basics.summary: Full stack web developer from Petropavl, Kazakhstan. Mostly working with PHP and Yii 2 framework. Perfectionist, but try to find a balance between quality, deadlines and requirements.

work.summary: News and analytics about agriculture in Kazakhstan. Developing with Django and PostgreSQL.
highlights: Rewrote existing company site from Joomla to Django
Fixed bugs, improved functionality, migrated all existing data
Some content is now closed and payment required to view it
Implemented image cropping for better images display
Developed new module - agricultural enterprises with map
Personal achievement - Learned Python basics
Personal achievement - Learned Django basics
Personal achievement - Improved skills of configuring VPS from scratch

work.summary: FORA company is one of the largest sellers of electronic equipment. Has many shops across Kazakhstan. Backend programming in Yii 1 and Yii 2 PHP frameworks. Frontend programming and some work with layout using JavaScript, jQuery, AngularJS, Bootstrap 3
highlights: Worked on support and improvement of main public company site - fora.kz (e-commerce). It was built with Yii 1.1, not it's rewritten in Yii 2
Worked on public company job service - job.fora.kz (development from scratch, support). Built with Yii 2

Worked on internal private ERP system - development from scratch according to company specific and needs. Built with Yii 2 and PostgreSQL. Modules development and support. Currently system is introduced and required for usage for every employee
Worked on some other internal private projects to automate and optimize work of employees inside the company (guarantee and repair service, advertising, etc.)

Personal achievement - Reached completely new level in work with PHP - learned OOP, MVC, some design patterns, frameworks Yii 1 and Yii 2, PHPDoc, PSR, development on the latest versions (5.6), with usage of its features
Personal achievement - Learned and started to use Git VCS
Personal achievement - Improved working with layout skills, started to use SASS, CSS frameworks - Bootstrap 2 Ð¸ 3, Grunt for building project assets
Personal achievement - Usage of JIRA tracking system
Personal achievement - Improved JavaScript and jQuery skills, used AngularJS and template engines (Handlebars.js) for solving some tasks
Personal achievement - Started to use more convenient local development tools, such as Vagrant and Puppet (with PuPHPet)
Personal achievement - Have got Debian and Ubuntu OS administration skills
Personal achievement - Started to use package managers, such as Composer, Bower, NPM
Personal achievement - Have faced with PostgreSQL RDBMS, used its some unique features in developed projects
Personal achievement - Improved Nginx and Apache web servers configuring skills
Personal achievement - Have got basic testing knowledge using Codeception
Personal achievement - Developed few extensions for Yii 2
Personal achievement - Usage of technologies, such as Redis, RabbitMQ, memcached in projects
Personal achievement - Usage of wide set of auxiliary libraries and components

work.summary: INSY company is website developing company based in Petropavl, Kazakhstan. Work on company projects in PHP based CMS (UMI.CMS and 1C-Bitrix).
highlights: Working with layout
Programming (including non-standard functionality) using CMS API
Minor design fixes
Integration between 1C and sites, adding related non-standard functionality to the sites
Filling products catalog on one of the projects - http://mchip.kz/ (about 2000 products)
Editing product images
Content management
Management work with clients
Basic SEO and SMM
Integration of payment systems - VISA, QIWI, KASSA 24
Work on internal company CRM - completion of existing modules and development of new ones.
Working with layout skills (HTML, CSS) and programming (PHP, JavaScript, JQuery) were considerably improved
Personal achievement - SQL and MySQL knowledge was improved
Personal achievement - Have mastered XSLT template engine
Personal achievement - Development of non-standard functionality in UMI.CMS and 1C-Bitrix
Personal achievement - Active participation in company life, initiative manifestation
Personal achievement - Have got basic skills with work with CentOs
Personal achievement - Started to use VCS - HG (Mercurial)

work.summary: Bars Stroy company is construction materials seller. Has some branches across Kazakhstan. Improvement and support of existing main company site based on UMI.CMS (PHP)
highlights: Working with layout
Programming - fixing bugs, development of new functionality
Minor design fixes
Content management
1C integration
Filling products catalog - almost all products (filled products count - about 7000)
Products photographing and photos editing
Basic SEO
SMM
Clients support in social networks
Rewriting, copywriting
Personal achievement - improved knowledge of HTML, CSS, PHP, JavaScript, jQuery
Personal achievement - have got good experience with UMI.CMS

Personal achievement - work was versatile (because I was the only one working with site, at the end designer helped a bit) and wasn't limited to programming only: editing images skills, SEO knowledge were improved, learned a lot of new information about construction materials

Personal achievement - filled products catalog almost alone, in the future it became a base for e-commerce (after my leaving, because at the moment of my work administration was not ready to create it yet)

Personal achievement - have got communication experience with people of different positions and from different departments (including meetings, etc.) and clients during answering and consultation through messengers and social networks
Personal achievement - showed initiative in many questions related to site

volunteer.summary: Personal site with portfolio. Hosting is expired, person is not interested to develop site and fill content anymore.
highlights: Learned Ruby basics
Learned Ruby on Rails 4 basics
Deployed project to shared hosting using Capistrano
Implemented image cropping for better photos display

references.name: Viktor Aslanov, founder of Zernovye & Maslichnye. Kazakhstan
references.reference: Alexey helped us rewrite our site margin.kz from Joomla to Django, improve functionality, fix bugs and migrate all existing data. Traffic and sales were increased. Alexey is always ready to help, explain and recommend the more suitable way of solving problem. He is thoughtful and experienced programmer, also punctual and responsible. We are happy with his work and support of our site.
